description:
Data Input: Settlement footprint from Facebook's High-Resolution Population Density Maps https://data.humdata.org/dataset/marshall-islands-high-resolution-population-density-maps-demographic-estimates
Population allocated proportionally using 2011 census population counts at enumeration area level.
Year Population Growth Rate of 0.3% has been applied to update population up to 2020
The human settlement footprint with census population allocated has been converted into a 100 m resolution raster.
name: Marshal_Islands_Population_Grid_2020
